alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 8:57PM CST until March 12 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 32.3 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 29.7 Mon 7 pm CST 32.0 32.3 32.1 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
